org.openimaj.content.animation.animator

Class LoopingValueAnimator<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.content.animation.animator.LoopingValueAnimator<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type produce by animator
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ValueAnimator<T>

    public class LoopingValueAnimator<T>
extends Object
implements ValueAnimator<T>
    A ValueAnimator that can wrap another ValueAnimator to produce looping behavior by resetting when the animator has finished.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LoopingValueAnimator(ValueAnimator<T> animator)
      Construct around the given ValueAnimator to provide looping behavior.

      Construct a new LoopingValueAnimator from a ValueAnimator.
      T nextValue()
      Get the next value.
      void reset()
      Reset the animator back to its initial condition.

    • Method Detail

      • nextValue

        public T nextValue()
        Description copied from interface: ValueAnimator
        Get the next value. If the animator has finished, the continuation is checked to see if there are more animators to run. If not, then the last value is returned.
        Specified by:
        nextValue in interface ValueAnimator<T>
        Returns:
        the next value.

      • hasFinished

        public boolean hasFinished()
        Description copied from interface: ValueAnimator
        Has the animator finished animating the value.
        Specified by:
        hasFinished in interface ValueAnimator<T>
        Returns:
        true if the animator has finished; false otherwise

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Description copied from interface: ValueAnimator
